```{r load_packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(fontawesome)
library(here)
```

This section consists primarily of preview content, in-class notes, R walkthroughs and related materials. Items are released on a weekly basis.

You can download all of the data sets we'll be using this term below

<center>
```{r echo=FALSE,eval=TRUE,message=FALSE}
loc <- here::here("static", "data", "R-data-sets.zip")

downloadthis::download_file(
  path = loc,
  output_name = "R data sets",
  button_label = "&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span style='color:#ffffff'>Download</span>",
  button_type = "primary",
  has_icon = TRUE,
  icon = "fa fa-save",
  class = "hvr-sweep-to-left"
  )
```
</center>
